column1: Men have a higher risk of getting heart disease than women, except in older adults.
If your parents had a stroke, you are at higher risk.
- Diseases such as cancer, chronic kidney disease, and some types of arthritis.
Blood clots from the heart may travel to the brain and cause a stroke.
- Avoid sodium (salt) and fats found in fried foods, processed foods, and baked goods.
If you are taking these medicines, take steps to prevent yourself from falling or tripping, which can lead to bleeding.
